column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I ordered three pastries
column2: and this review alone is for the chocolate chip walnut cookie
column3: my favorite chocolate chip cookie in Houston. I broke the cookie in half
column4: and no chocolate chips. I broke it into another quarter and another one
column5: still not a single chocolate chip. Essentially I got a walnut cookie. I understand mistakes happen
column7: but NO CHOCOLATE CHIPS? That's unforgivable.
